Weapon.Name: Whispering Blade
Weapon.Description: A slender sword that hums with an eerie, untraceable melody, known to slice the air with the precision of a calm breeze.
Weapon.UniqueProperties: +2 Strength; +1 Charisma Grants the ability to cast silence on an opponent, preventing any spell casting for a short duration. As the blade cuts through the air, it silences the cries and spells of its foe, enveloping the battlefield in an eerie quiet. Weapon

Weapon.Description: A mystical staff that channels the raw energy of starlight, used by sages of the ancient astral order.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Calls down a barrage of comets on foes, dealing area damage.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: A cascade of stars falls from the heavens, devastating all who stand against the wielder.
